docs.snippet: One-Thousand-Yard Run: Ron Speirs sets flat-floor mark (2 mins 10 sec) (M)...
docs.abstract: One-Thousand-Yard Run: Ron Speirs sets flat-floor mark (2 mins 10 sec) (M)

byline.original: By WILLIAM J. MILLERRon Speirs ran the fastest flat-floor 1,000-yard run ever when he was clocked in 2 minutes 10.1 seconds last night at the Metropolitan Amateur Athletic Union's senior indoor track and field championships at the 102d Engineers Armory

docs.lead_paragraph: CINEMA NAUTICA Who says that a dollar doesn't go far in New York? It will get you in to see "Mutiny on the Bounty" (1935), one of the screen's all-time sea classics, today aboard the St. John's Guild Hospital Ship anchored at Pier 15 at the South Street Seaport.

headline.main: Red Smith; O.J. Will Play If He Isn't Coalhouse

docs.snippet: FELINE FIESTA Who's for cats? The Museum of American Folk Art at 49 West 53d Street, with a new exhibition today through March 26, Some diligent museum digging on the subject has unearthed the fact that the cat figures more prominently in American...
docs.lead_paragraph: FELINE FIESTA Who's for cats? The Museum of American Folk Art at 49 West 53d Street, with a new exhibition today through March 26, Some diligent museum digging on the subject has unearthed the fact that the cat figures more prominently in American folk art than perhaps any other animal cats on quilts, hooked rugs, furniture, fireboards, pottery, samplers, canes, even on a scrimshaw tooth.

docs.snippet: Joseph Gasler, barge engineer for fuel-oil concern owned by family of former NJ Sen Jerome Epstein, is given noncustodial sentence and fined $1,000 for part in alleged scheme to steal millions of gals of oil from Exxon's Bayway refinery; promises ...
docs.abstract: Joseph Gasler, barge engineer for fuel-oil concern owned by family of former NJ Sen Jerome Epstein, is given noncustodial sentence and fined $1,000 for part in alleged scheme to steal millions of gals of oil from Exxon's Bayway refinery; promises Superior Ct Judge V William DiBuono that he will testify against other participants (S)
